name: create_or_update_file
description: Create or update a single file in a GitHub repository

path.description: Path where to create/update the file

branch.description: Branch to create/update the file in

sha.description: SHA of the file being replaced (required when updating existing files)

name: search_repositories
description: Search for GitHub repositories

perPage.description: Number of results per page (default: 30, max: 100)

name: create_repository
description: Create a new GitHub repository in your account

private.description: Whether the repository should be private

name: get_file_contents
description: Get the contents of a file or directory from a GitHub repository

path.description: Path to the file or directory

name: push_files
description: Push multiple files to a GitHub repository in a single commit

name: create_issue
description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

name: create_pull_request
description: Create a new pull request in a GitHub repository

head.description: The name of the branch where your changes are implemented

base.description: The name of the branch you want the changes pulled into

draft.description: Whether to create the pull request as a draft

maintainer_can_modify.description: Whether maintainers can modify the pull request

name: fork_repository
description: Fork a GitHub repository to your account or specified organization

organization.description: Optional: organization to fork to (defaults to your personal account)

name: create_branch
description: Create a new branch in a GitHub repository

from_branch.description: Optional: source branch to create from (defaults to the repository's default branch)

name: list_commits
description: Get list of commits of a branch in a GitHub repository

name: list_issues
description: List issues in a GitHub repository with filtering options

name: update_issue
description: Update an existing issue in a GitHub repository

name: add_issue_comment
description: Add a comment to an existing issue

name: search_code
description: Search for code across GitHub repositories

name: search_issues
description: Search for issues and pull requests across GitHub repositories

name: search_users
description: Search for users on GitHub

name: get_issue
description: Get details of a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

name: get_pull_request
description: Get details of a specific pull request

name: list_pull_requests
description: List and filter repository pull requests

state.description: State of the pull requests to return

head.description: Filter by head user or head organization and branch name

name: create_pull_request_review
description: Create a review on a pull request

commit_id.description: The SHA of the commit that needs a review

body.description: The body text of the review

path.description: The relative path to the file being commented on

position.description: The position in the diff where you want to add a review comment

comments.description: Comments to post as part of the review

name: merge_pull_request
description: Merge a pull request

commit_title.description: Title for the automatic commit message

commit_message.description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message

name: get_pull_request_files
description: Get the list of files changed in a pull request

name: get_pull_request_status
description: Get the combined status of all status checks for a pull request

name: update_pull_request_branch
description: Update a pull request branch with the latest changes from the base branch

expected_head_sha.description: The expected SHA of the pull request's HEAD ref

name: get_pull_request_comments
description: Get the review comments on a pull request

name: get_pull_request_reviews
description: Get the reviews on a pull request

name: create_project
description: Create a new project in a GitHub repository

name: get_project
description: Get details about a specific project

name: update_project
description: Update an existing project's details

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project

name: list_projects
description: List all projects in a GitHub repository

name: create_project_column
description: Create a new column in a project

name: list_project_columns
description: List all columns in a project

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project

name: update_project_column
description: Update an existing project column

column_id.description: The unique identifier of the column

name: delete_project_column
description: Delete a project column

column_id.description: The unique identifier of the column

name: add_card_to_column
description: Add a new card to a project column

column_id.description: The ID of the column to add card to

content_type.description: Type of content for the card

content_id.description: ID of the issue or pull request (required if content_type is Issue or PullRequest)

note.description: The note content for the card (required if content_type is Note)

name: list_column_cards
description: List all cards in a project column

column_id.description: The unique identifier of the column

name: move_card
description: Move a card to a different position or column

card_id.description: The unique identifier of the card

position.description: The position of the card (top, bottom, or after:<card_id>)

column_id.description: The column ID to move the card to

name: delete_card
description: Delete a card from a project

card_id.description: The unique identifier of the card

name: list_organization_projects
description: List all projects in a GitHub organization (at organization level, not repository level)

name: list_organization_projects_v2
description: List projects V2 in a GitHub organization using GraphQL API

name: get_project_v2
description: Get details of a GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

id.description: The node ID of the project

name: create_project_v2
description: Create a new GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

ownerId.description: The node ID of the organization or user

name: update_project_v2
description: Update a GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

projectId.description: The node ID of the project

name: add_item_to_project_v2
description: Add an issue or pull request to a GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

projectId.description: The node ID of the project

contentId.description: The node ID of the issue or pull request to add

name: list_project_v2_items
description: List items in a GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

projectId.description: The node ID of the project

name: update_project_v2_item_field
description: Update a field value for an item in a GitHub project V2 using GraphQL API

projectId.description: The node ID of the project

itemId.description: The node ID of the item

fieldId.description: The node ID of the field

value.description: The new value for the field
